body: {"success": true, "data": {"results": [{"content": "# Amazon Seller Guide - China Marketplace ## Marketplace: CN (Amazon.cn) **Region**: Asia Pacific **Currency**: CNY (Chinese Yuan) **Language**: Simplified Chinese **Marketplace ID**: AAHKV2X7AFYLW ## Getting Started as a CN Seller ### Registration Requirements To sell on Amazon.cn, you need: - Chinese business license (\u8425\u4e1a\u6267\u7167) - Chinese bank account - Legal representative ID card - Business registration address in China - Chinese phone number ### Seller Types 1. **Individual Seller**: Not available in CN marketplace 2. **Professional Seller**: \u00a5300/month (waived for first 3 months for new sellers) ## China-Specific Regulations ### Business License Requirements - Must have valid Chinese business entity - Business scope must include e-commerce or relevant product categories - Annual verification required ### Product Compliance - **CCC Certification** (\u4e2d\u56fd\u5f3a\u5236\u8ba4\u8bc1): Mandatory for many product categories - **China Food Safety Law**: Imported food products - **Cosmetics Registration**: NMPA approval required - **Medical Device Registration**: NMPA certification - **Customs Documentation**: For imported goods ### Import Requirements - Import license for certain categories - Customs clearance documentation - Quarantine inspection for food, health products - Origin certificates ## Fulfillment Options ### Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) - China - **Warehouses**: 15+ fulfillment centers across major cities - Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, Chengdu, Wuhan,", "score": 0.5715, "location": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "metadata": {"x-amz-bedrock-kb-source-uri": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "marketplace": "CN", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-data-source-id": "E2EDW4MOKC", "language": "chinese", "region": "asia_pacific", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-chunk-id": "1%3A0%3AT2bkS5sBF6DLs3_vrnPe", "document_type": "seller_guide"}}, {"content": "premium - White: Avoid for gifts (associated with mourning) ### Gift Giving - Avoid clocks, umbrellas (negative associations) - Even numbers preferred (except 4) - Premium packaging important ## Success Strategies for CN Market 1. **Build Trust**: Authenticity certificates, brand story 2. **Localize Content**: Professional Chinese translation 3. **Leverage KOLs**: Key Opinion Leaders for product reviews 4. **Social Media**: Integrate with Chinese social platforms 5. **Customer Service**: Fast, Chinese-language support 6. **Quality Focus**: Chinese consumers prioritize quality for imports --- **Document Type**: Seller Guide **Marketplace**: CN **Last Updated**: December 2025 **Version**: 2.0 **\u8bed\u8a00**: English (\u4e2d\u6587\u7248\u672c\u53e6\u89c1)", "score": 0.5237, "location": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "metadata": {"x-amz-bedrock-kb-source-uri": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "marketplace": "CN", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-data-source-id": "E2EDW4MOKC", "language": "chinese", "region": "asia_pacific", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-chunk-id": "1%3A0%3AVWbkS5sBF6DLs3_vrnPf", "document_type": "seller_guide"}}, {"content": ") - **WeChat Pay**: Second most popular (30%+) - **China UnionPay**: Credit/debit cards - **Amazon Pay**: For Prime members ### Logistics Challenges - Complex customs procedures - Multi-tiered city delivery - Holiday season logistics congestion - Last-mile delivery in rural areas ## Cross-Border Selling to China ### Global Selling Program - Sell from overseas to Chinese consumers - No Chinese business license required - Products shipped from overseas warehouses - Subject to import duties and taxes ### Required Documents - Business license from home country - Product authenticity certificates - Import permits (category-dependent) - Insurance documentation ### Customs and Duties - Individual cross-border limit: \u00a55,000 per transaction - Annual limit: \u00a526,000 per person - Duty rates: 0-50% depending on category - VAT: 13% standard rate ## Compliance Requirements ### Consumer Protection Law - 7-day return policy mandatory - Product quality guarantees - Accurate product descriptions required - False advertising penalties ### E-Commerce Law (\u7535\u5b50\u5546\u52a1\u6cd5) - Business license display required - Tax registration and payment - Platform responsibility for seller compliance - User privacy protection ### Data Localization - Customer data must be stored in China - Comply with Personal Information Protection Law (PIPL) - Cross-border data transfer restrictions ## Resources for CN Sellers - **Amazon China Seller University**: Localized training (Chinese) - **Seller Forums**: Chinese language community - **Customer Service**: Chinese-speaking support team - **Third-party Service Providers**: Logistics, translation,", "score": 0.5184, "location": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "metadata": {"x-amz-bedrock-kb-source-uri": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "marketplace": "CN", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-data-source-id": "E2EDW4MOKC", "language": "chinese", "region": "asia_pacific", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-chunk-id": "1%3A0%3AU2bkS5sBF6DLs3_vrnPf", "document_type": "seller_guide"}}], "count": 3, "query": "What are the seller guidelines for China market?", "knowledge_base_id": "OYBA7PFNNQ"}, "timestamp": "2025-12-25T15:30:24.684373Z"}
